attributes.additional_details: I ask for your support now in submitting a formal complaint to BIS, using their own government policy against them, on how to conduct a 'fair and transparent consultation process'. The apprenticeship reforms technical consultation stated only 80 employer responses from the July consultation had been received, when I know over 1600 employer views had been submitted from 4 provider sources - these were only counted as 4 responses! The impact of the Apprenticeship reforms will undoubtedly affect apprentices of the future in our community. As the NEET figures rise, these reforms will have a devastating impact on the number of new starts in 2016. It is clear there is a common trend across the country that many employers feel the same way, but the government chooses not to listen.  Please see hyperlink to our website for copy of full letter and please support this complaint. To view the full complaint please visit: www.blhairdressing.co.uk/complainttobis-apprenticeshipreforms
